title: But thanks for checking in
desc: anachronistic in both context and cultural relevance

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
some varmit called and asked 
 if my fridge was running

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
listen kid, we're all 
 running from something
